meta.content: Lincoln County Schools serves students and is located in Fayetteville, TN.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 985px; height: 502px;

img.alt: dr heath with students at fes

div.div: Teacher of the Year recipients were honored at a banquet hosted by the Lincoln County School Board and the Lincoln County Department of Education. Pictured are (from left) Naomi Henderson, Stone Bridge Academy; Ben Fuhs, South Lincoln; Cody Riggins, South Lincoln; Kim Owens, Blanche; Trina Quick, Flintville; McLean Whitt, Highland Rim; Donna Watkins, Blanche; Jennifer Lamb, Highland Rim; Carrie Bradford, Unity; Liz Durham, Unity; Brett Spray, Flintville; Amy Lowe, Lincoln County High School; and Tim Bradford, Lincoln County High School.
